hero.headline: Local Sandals, Quality for the Entire Archipelago
hero.subheadline: New MC is a trusted wholesale sandal supplier for stores throughout Indonesia.

quality.title: Consistent Quality
quality.description: Every product goes through strict quality control to ensure consistently high standards.

price.title: Competitive Wholesale Prices
price.description: Competitive wholesale prices with volume discounts for large orders.

shipping.title: Ready to Ship Throughout Indonesia
shipping.description: Shipping services to all provinces in Indonesia with a reliable logistics network.

story.title: About New MC
story.content: New MC has been established for many years as a trusted wholesale sandal supplier in Indonesia. We focus on wholesale business and serve store owners in various provinces throughout the archipelago. With a commitment to stable and reliable product quality, we have built trust from hundreds of business partners who entrust their sandal needs to us.

products.title: Our Product Range
products.subtitle: Complete collection of sandals for various needs

men.title: Men's Sandals
men.description: Collection of men's sandals with various models and sizes for your wholesale needs.

women.title: Women's Sandals
women.description: Women's sandals with modern and comfortable designs, available in various options.

kids.title: Kids' Sandals
kids.description: Safe and comfortable children's sandals with various characters and attractive colors.

flipflop.title: Flip Flops
flipflop.description: Quality flip flops with competitive wholesale prices.

slipper.title: Slippers
slipper.description: Comfortable slippers for daily use with guaranteed quality.

casual.title: Casual Sandals
casual.description: Casual sandals with trendy designs for various occasions.

testimonial1.text: Since working with New MC, my store's sales have increased significantly. Product quality is consistent and service is excellent.
testimonial1.author: Mr. Ahmad, Sandal Store Owner Jakarta

testimonial2.text: Competitive wholesale prices and fast shipping make New MC our top choice. Highly recommended!
testimonial2.author: Mrs. Siti, Sandal Distributor Bandung

testimonial3.text: The quality of sandals from New MC is very stable, never disappointing. Our customers are always satisfied with the products.
testimonial3.author: Mr. Budi, Sandal Store Surabaya

cta.headline: Ready to Expand Your Store's Collection?
